thread.section_title: Shangri-La Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Shangri-La Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anne-Marie L
title: Excellent
text: An architectural gem built in the late 1800s to serve as residence to a grand nephew of Napoleon Bonaparte, the hotel conveys a warm, home-like atmosphere without failing to maintain impeccable standards. Service is efficient and courteous, lounge / restaurants serve excellent food from east and west in beautiful decor, the pool is breathtaking and the spa instantly relaxing. While combining the elegance of Europe in the late 19th century and an authentic flavor of Asia, Shangrila-la Paris is not only gorgeous, but the most original 5-star hotel in Paris.
